post_title: WTB: Arrggg, matey, I need some Pirates with these rare backs
post_content:
I am looking for the following players, with these specific backs. Low grade is preferred - these are for a binder set:

Ed Abbaticchio (Brown Sleeves): EPDG
Howie Camnitz (Arms Folded): EPDG
Tommy Leach (Portrait): Hindu
Lefty Leifield (Pitching): Hindu
Nick Maddox: Carolina Brights or Cycle 350
Deacon Phillippe: Carolina Brights or Cycle 350

Please let me know if you have anything. I only need one of each back. So if I were to find an Abbaticchio EPDG, I would no longer need the Camnitz. 

Thanks for any help you can provide. 

Chris
I consigned a psa 4 Abbaticchio brown sleeves EPDG in the next Sterling Auction. It will be online in December if you still need one 😀. Good luck with your quest.
Thank you! That Abbaticchio is probably a little too nice for my needs but I’m always on the lookout.
